mapper.select:
select day, (sum(t.duration) - sum(b.size - b.remain)) as remain, sum(t.duration) as size from timeslot t join box b on (t.id = b.slot_id
and t.peak = 1
and b.day >= #{from} and b.day <= #{to})
group by b.day

select b.year, b.month, (sum(t.duration) - sum(b.size - b.remain)) as remain, sum(t.duration) as size from timeslot t join box b on (t.id = b.slot_id
and t.peak = 1
and b.year = #{year})
group by b.month

select b.day, sum (case when o.stats = 0 then 0 else g.size end) as paid, sum (case when o.stats = 0 then g.size else 0 end) as notPaid, sum(t.duration-g.size) as remain, sum(t.duration) as size from timeslot t join box b on (t.id = b.slot_id
and t.peak = 1
and b.day >= #{from} and b.day <= #{to})
join goods g on (b.slot_id = g.box_slot_id and b.day = g.day) join orders o on (g.order_id = o.id) group by b.day
